content:
Observation: Crafting commands:
craft 3 dark oak sign using 6 dark oak planks, 1 stick
craft 4 dark oak planks using 1 dark oak log
craft 1 stick using 1 planks
craft 4 stick using 2 bamboo
craft 4 oak planks using 1 oak log
craft 1 dark oak fence using 2 stick, 4 dark oak planks
craft 1 warped stairs using 6 warped planks
craft 3 oak sign using 6 oak planks, 1 stick

Goal: craft 2 oak planks

Thought: I should check if I can fetch dark oak planks directly from the environment or the inventory.
Action: inventory

Thought: There is no dark oak plank in my inventory. I should try to get it from the environment.
Action: get 2 oak planks
Observation: Could not find 2 oak planks

Thought: I cannot get oak planks directly, I need to craft it. From the crafting commands, I can use: craft 4 oak planks using 1 oak log. Ingredients needed: 1 dark oak log. Input assumption: I have the ingredients needed in my inventory. Let me verify this first.
Action: inventory

Thought: There is no oak log in my inventory. I should try to get them from the environment. Every round I can get or craft at most 1 object, so I first try to get 1 oak log from the environment.
Action: get 1 oak log

Thought: I have got 1 oak log. Now that I have all the ingredients necessary: 1 oak log. Then I will use the crafting commands: craft 4 oak planks using 1 oak log.
Action: craft 4 oak planks using 1 oak log
